sent.orig: Allow me to welcome you here in Ingolstadt on behalf of the entire Board of Management.
sent.trans: 首先，我代表奥迪公司管理董事会对大家来到英戈尔斯塔特表示热烈的欢迎。

sent.orig: What if we became known for approaching heaven on behalf of outcasts and disagreeable people?
sent.trans: 如果我们忠心地为这群遭人鄙视、唾弃的人代祷，又将如何？

sent.orig: But for the first time am forced to speak out on behalf of my patients.
sent.trans: 但对于第一次我不得不出来说话就代表我的病人。

sent.orig: Integrity- : All the basis of cooperation, on behalf of the efficiency of success!
sent.trans: 诚信-：一切合作的基础，代表成功的效率！

sent.orig: If you are applying on behalf of natural persons, to be a copy of the card.
sent.trans: 如果您是以自然人名义提出申请，需身份证的复印件。
